15 typedef struct {
19  uint64_t u64[2];
20 } prng_state;
21 
27 void prng_init(prng_state * const p) {
28  p->u64[0] = (uint64_t) 0x082cdc0b3649c1b8ULL;
29  p->u64[1] = (uint64_t) 0x19a7a27c89201352ULL;
30 }
31 
38 static inline void prng_perturb(prng_state * const p, const uint64_t v) {
39  p->u64[0] ^= v ^ (v << 11U) ^ (v >> 7U) ^ (v << 23U);
40  p->u64[1] ^= (v >> 17U) ^ (v << 31U);
41 }
42 
49 static inline uint64_t prng_next(prng_state * const p) {
50  const uint64_t tmp0 = p->u64[1];
51  const uint64_t tmp1 = p->u64[0] ^ (p->u64[0] << 23U);
52  p->u64[0] = tmp0;
53  return (p->u64[1] = (tmp1 ^ tmp0 ^ (tmp1 >> 17U) ^ (tmp0 >> 26U))) + tmp0;
54 }
55 
60 static inline float prng_delta(prng_state * const p) {
61  float f;
62  do {
63  f = (float) prng_next(p) / 9223372036854775808.0f - 1.0f;
64  } while (f <= -1.0f || f >= +1.0f);
65  return f;
66 }
67 
74 int householder_vector(prng_state * const p, std::vector<float>& v,
75  const int D) {
76  while (1) {
77  float norm = 0.0f;
78  float scale;
79 
80  v.resize(D);
81 
82  /* Set components, and calculate 2-norm. */
83  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
84  const float c = prng_delta(p);
85  v[d] = c;
86  norm += c * c;
87  }
88 
89  /* Xorshift128 failure mode is all zeros. */
90  if (norm <= 0.0f)
91  return -1;
92 
93  /* Calculate the scaling factor, */
94  scale = sqrt(1.0 / norm);
95  /* scale the components, and recalculate 2-norm. */
96  norm = 0.0f;
97  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
98  const float c = scale * v[d];
99  v[d] = c;
100  norm += c * c;
101  }
102 
103  /* If the 2-norm is correct to 16 bits or so, accept it. */
104  if (norm > 0.999984741211f && norm < 1.00001525879f)
105  return 0;
106  }
107  return -1;
108 }
109 
118 template<typename T>
119 void householder_transform(const int N, const int D,
120  std::vector<T>& transformed,
121  const std::vector<T>& original,
122  const std::vector<float>& vector) {
123  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
124  const int offset = i * D;
125  float distance = 0.0f;
126 
127  /* Dot product between Householder vector and original point
128  * == distance from point to Householder reflection hyperplane. */
129  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d)
130  distance += vector[d] * original[offset + d];
131 
132  /* Transformed point is on the other side of the hyperplane.
133  * Double the distance. */
134  distance += distance;
135 
136  /* Calculate transformed coordinates. */
137  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d)
138  transformed.push_back(original[offset + d] - distance * vector[d]);
139  }
140 }
141 
150 template<typename T>
151 void householder_transform(const int N, const int D,
152  Division_Euclidean_space<T>& transformed,
153  const std::vector<T>& original,
154  const std::vector<float>& vector) {
155  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
156  const int offset = i * D;
157  float distance = 0.0f;
158 
159  /* Dot product between Householder vector and original point
160  * == distance from point to Householder reflection hyperplane. */
161  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d)
162  distance += vector[d] * original[offset + d];
163 
164  /* Transformed point is on the other side of the hyperplane.
165  * Double the distance. */
166  distance += distance;
167 
168  /* Calculate transformed coordinates. */
169  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d)
170  transformed.insert(original[offset + d] - distance * vector[d]);
171  }
172 }
173 
184 template<typename T>
185 void householder_transform(const int N, const int D,
186  Division_Euclidean_space<T>& transformed,
187  const std::vector<T>& original,
188  const std::vector<float>& vector,
189  size_t* split_dims, const int t) {
190  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
191  const int offset = i * D;
192  //const int offset_t = i * t;
193  float distance = 0.0f;
194 
195  /* Dot product between Householder vector and original point
196  * == distance from point to Householder reflection hyperplane. */
197  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d)
198  distance += vector[d] * original[offset + d];
199 
200  /* Transformed point is on the other side of the hyperplane.
201  * Double the distance. */
202  distance += distance;
203 
204  /* Calculate transformed coordinates. */
205  for (int d = 0; d < t; ++d)
206  //transformed[offset_t + d]
207  transformed.insert(
208  original[offset + split_dims[d]] - distance * vector[split_dims[d]]);
209  }
210 }
211 
222 template<typename T>
223 int rotate(const int N, const int D, std::vector<T>& transformed,
224  const std::vector<T>& original, std::vector<float>& v) {
225  // this is used in auto-configuration
226  prng_state prng;
227  prng_init(&prng);
228  prng_perturb(&prng, myRandomUniform(4000));
229  prng_perturb(&prng, time(NULL));
230 
231  if (householder_vector(&prng, v, D)) {
232  std::cout << "Xorshift128 failure mode is all zeros.\n";
233  return -1;
234  }
235  householder_transform<T>(N, D, transformed, original, v);
236  return 0;
237 }
238
